rootCause: All nodes in the ha3 dev cluster were tainted with control-plane NoSchedule, leaving no schedulable nodes for Traefik or klipper-helm jobs, and the ha3-untaint-control-plane helper failed to remove the taints.
resolution: Update ha3-untaint-control-plane to forcibly remove control-plane/master taints with verification and add traefik-install preflight checks that fail fast when every node is tainted.
